definitions.definition: (dog-breeding) A female dog or other canine, particularly a recent mother.
definitions.example: My bitch just had puppies; they're so cute!

definitions.definition: A despicable or disagreeable, aggressive person, usually a woman.
definitions.example: Ann gossiped about me and mocked my work; sometimes she can be a real bitch!

definitions.definition: A man considered weak, effeminate, timid or pathetic in some way
A submissive person who does what others want; a man forced or coerced into a homoerotic relationship.
definitions.example: Dude, don't be such a bitch. Assert yourself.

definitions.definition: (of a man) A playful variation on dog (sense "man").
A complaint, especially when the complaint is unjustified.
(usually only used in the singular) A difficult or confounding problem.
definitions.example: Level 5 was a real bitch, don’t you think?

definitions.definition: A queen (playing card), particularly the queen of spades in the card game of hearts.
To behave or act as a bitch.
To criticize spitefully, often for the sake of complaining rather than in order to have the problem corrected.
definitions.example: All you ever do is bitch about the food I cook for you!
